00021 #ifndef _FusionCHPQuantificationData_HEADER_
00022 #define _FusionCHPQuantificationData_HEADER_
00023 
00024 /*! \file FusionCHPQuantificationData.h This file provides CHP file reading capabilities for CHP files with a single quantification value.*/
00025 
00026 #include "calvin_files/data/src/CHPQuantificationData.h"
00027 #include "calvin_files/fusion/src/FusionCHPData.h"
00028 //
00029 
00030 namespace affymetrix_fusion_io
00031 {
00032 
00033 /*! This class provides storage and reading capabilities for quantification CHP files */
00034 class FusionCHPQuantificationData : public FusionCHPData
00035 {
00036 private:
00037 
00038         /*! Constructor */
00039         FusionCHPQuantificationData();
00040 
00041         /*! The CHP object. */
00042         affymetrix_calvin_io::CHPQuantificationData chpData;
00043 
00044 public:
00045 
00046         /*! Destructor */
00047         ~FusionCHPQuantificationData();
00048 
00049         /*! Get the id of the file (only valid for Command Console "calvin" files)
00050          * @return The unique file id.
00051          */
00052         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType FileId();
00053 
00054         /*! Returns the GenericData object associated with a Calvin file, NULL for GCOS files. */
00055         affymetrix_calvin_io::GenericData *GetGenericData();
00056 
00057     /*! Returns the data set header. */
00058     affymetrix_calvin_io::DataSetHeader &GetDataSetHeader() { return chpData.GetDataSetHeader(); }
00059 
00060         /*! Gets the class name. */
00061         affymetrix_calvin_utilities::AffymetrixGuidType GetObjectName();
00062 
00063         /*! Gets the name of the algorithm.
00064          * @return The algorithm name.
00065          */
00066         std::wstring GetAlgName() { return chpData.GetAlgName(); }
00067 
00068         /*! Gets the algorithm version.
00069          * @return The version.
00070          */
00071         std::wstring GetAlgVersion() { return chpData.GetAlgVersion(); }
00072 
00073         /*! Sets the array type */
00074         std::wstring GetArrayType() { return chpData.GetArrayType(); }
00075 
00076         /*! Gets the algorithm parameters
00077          * @return The algoirhtm parameters.
00078          */
00079         ParameterNameValueTypeList GetAlgParams() { return chpData.GetAlgParams(); }
00080 
00081         /*! Gets the summary parameters
00082          * @return The summary parameters.
00083          */
00084         ParameterNameValueTypeList GetSummaryParams() { return chpData.GetSummaryParams(); }
00085 
00086         /*! Gets the number of entries (probe sets) */
00087         int32_t GetEntryCount() { return chpData.GetEntryCount(); }
00088 
00089         /*! Gets the sequence data.
00090          * @param index The row index.
00091          * @param entry The quantification value.
00092          */
00093         void GetQuantificationEntry(int index, affymetrix_calvin_data::ProbeSetQuantificationData &entry) { chpData.GetQuantificationEntry(index, entry); }
00094 
00095 private:
00096 
00097         /*! Reads the CHP file.
00098          * @return True if successful.
00099          */
00100         bool Read();
00101 
00102         /*! Reads the header of the CHP file
00103          * @return True if successful
00104          */
00105         bool ReadHeader();
00106 
00107 public:
00108         /*! A class to register the quantification CHP reader. */
00109         class Reg : public FusionCHPDataReg
00110         {
00111         public:
00112                 /*! Constructor - register the quantification file type. */
00113                 Reg() : FusionCHPDataReg()
00114                 {
00115                         std::list<std::string> ids;
00116                         ids.push_back(CHP_QUANTIFICATION_TYPE);
00117                         SetFileTypeIds(ids);
00118                 }
00119 
00120                 /*! Creates a quantification CHP object.
00121                  * @return The quantification CHP object.
00122                  */
00123                 FusionCHPData *MakeObject() { return new FusionCHPQuantificationData; }
00124         };
00125 
00126         /*! The one and only registration object. This registers the class as a CHP reader. */
00127         static Reg reg;
00128 
00129 public:
00130         /*! Converts the type to the quantification CHP type.
00131          * @param chip The pointer to the CHP data object.
00132          * @return The quantification CHP data type or NULL if not compatible.
00133          */
00134         static FusionCHPQuantificationData * FromBase(FusionCHPData *chip);
00135 };

00137 }
